dct_title_s: Syria, Lebanon  = Syrie, Liban = Syrien, Libanon = Szíria, Libanon
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by form lines, and spot heights. Depths shown by form lines. Map shows international and provincial boundaries, regions of Palestinian autonomy, cease-fire line, places of worship, cemeteries, archaeological sites. At head of title: "Cartographia, the map expert : World travel map, discover & explore" Includes ancillary maps: Dimashq (Damascus) -- Ḥalab (Aleppo) -- Plan of the antiquities of Palmyra -- Bayrūt (Beirut, Beyrouth) -- [Map of administrative divisions]. On verso: index to places. Publisher's no. on title panel: 0962. In colophon: "352962-01." Panel title.
